1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour,1 1/4 teaspoons kosher salt,1 teaspoon baking soda,1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon,1/2 teaspoon ground ginger,1/4 teaspoon ground cloves,1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg,1 can pumpkin puree,1/2 cup white sugar,3/4 cup packed light brown sugar,1/2 cup vegetable oil,2 tablespoons milk,2 large eggs,1/2 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips,1/4 cup pumpkin seeds,,
